name: Border
content:
# Border

The [`Border`(#d3e965)](/docs/weblab/border/) property specifies the style, width, and color of an element's border. It is a shorthand property for [`border: border-width border-style border-color;`(#d3e965)](/docs/weblab/border/).

examples.name: Border Property
examples.description: Setting a `<h1>` element to a solid red border of 5 pixels width.

short_description:
Border
The border property specifies the style, width, and color of an element's border. It is a shorthand property for border-width, border-style, and border-color.
tips:
* If [`border-style`(#d3e965)](/docs/weblab/border-style/) value  is not provided, the default is no border.
* If no [`border-color`(#d3e965)](/docs/weblab/border-color/) value is chosen, the border color will match the color of the text.
* If [`border-width`(#d3e965)](/docs/weblab/border-width/) value is not provided, the default is `medium`.
